📖 How to Play Snake

 The snake moves automatically when the game starts.

 👉 Control the movement by swiping your finger across the screen:
 - Swipe right → snake moves right
 - Swipe left → snake moves left
 - Swipe up → snake moves up
 - Swipe down → snake moves down

 ⏸️ Tap the II button in the top right corner to pause the game.

 In the pause menu, you can choose:
 - Resume – continue playing
 - Main Menu – return to the main menu
 - Exit – quit the game

 🧱 Walls: the play area has solid edges – if the snake hits a wall, the game ends.

 🐍 Snake and its body:
 - Eating fruit makes the snake grow and earns you points.
 - If the snake crosses itself, it bites its own tail → it shortens and your score decreases.

 🎯 Game objective: collect food to make the snake grow and score points, but avoid walls and its own body!
